item.description:
When: Tuesday, June 19, 2007 6:00 - 8:00pmDT
Where: Exemplar Law Offices
Ten Post Office Square -- Enter at 100 Milk Street! (Security Entrance)
8th Floor
Boston, MA 02109
Information: Information on Event:

Reocurring Monthly Event
Only 1 business per business/industry. To lock in your category contact rsvp/at/thewildwe.com Business Building Lecture the night of the Event (those who cannot make it will receive a recording of the Business Building Lecture

Evening of Event: How it works:

Event is spent giving elevator pitches and announcing referral successes
Interact in effective networking and referral making
Business Building Lecture
Next Morning: Set your personal goals for referrals and set up coffee talk with another Wild participatant

Freebies: N/A
Closest Subway and/or Bus Stop: Blue Line or Orange Line to State St

Cost: $25.00 RSVP

RSVP by Monday June 18, 2007, 3 p.m. EST
item.name: Wild Women Entrepreneurs Wild Referrals Meetup ($25)
